name: Save Our Future (Set of 3) Limited Edition ChicoBags速
description:
All bag designs were created by Long Beach youth, edited only to make them a printable single color. A portion of proceeds from each purchase goes directly to The Central LI Chapter of the Surfrider Foundation to fund local ocean conservation efforts. 

Each ChicoBag 速 has a convenient pouch and carabiner built in and is capable of carrying up to 40 lbs. Use the whole set for all your food shopping needs* or distribute individual bags as unique and thoughtful holiday gifts! Bags are washing machine-safe and made of 99% recycled materials. 

*Larger shopping trips require the equivalent of 2 sets while smaller visits to the grocery store or mall only require 1 set.


DISCLAIMER: Images shown are design graphics, not exact representations of final printed bags. Please understand there may be slight alterations in the printing process. Thank you!

**REMINDER:** ALL ORDERS WILL BE SHIPPED TO A CENTRAL LOCATION IN LONG BEACH, N.Y. THE FIRST WEEK OF DECEMBER, FOR PICK-UP BY CUSTOMERS. IF YOU DO NOT LIVE IN/ ARE UNABLE TO PICK-UP THE LONG BEACH AREA, PLEASE CONTACT US DIRECTLY AT guerrillaroom@gmail.com TO ARRANGE PRODUCT DELIVERY.  
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
